signals.problem_statement: The integration between Hiver and Outlook does not support email deletion synchronization.
signals.customer_ask: Confirmation on whether deleting an email in Hiver will also delete it in Outlook.
signals.context: Public institution, evaluating integration with existing systems.

signals.problem_statement: The customer requires detailed security and technical feasibility information for Hiver's integration with Outlook.
signals.customer_ask: Request for documents or information to provide to the IT team regarding security risks and access requirements.
signals.context: Public institution, needs to comply with thorough IT review processes.

signals.problem_statement: The customer is uncertain about the timeline for accessing the sandbox environment for testing.
signals.customer_ask: Request for extended access to the sandbox until the end of the day tomorrow.
signals.context: Public institution, team needs more time to test the platform.
